title: Tough Mudder: Tougher Together
overview: The series features more inspiring journeys of "everyday heroes" overcoming obstacles on Tough Mudder courses – and in – life with the help of their teams. Tough Mudder: Tougher Together digital series offer a deeper look at the participants and their support teams in their journey to take part in one of the most grueling endurance events on the planet testing teamwork skills, physical abilities and mental grit.
